resources.string:
The MTK Non-Framework Location-Based Service is a group of native services which include the following functions:
 1. AGPS SET-initiated location requests through a SUPL server.
 2. Network-initiated location requests through a carrier network.
 3. Network-initiated location requests through a SUPL server.
 4. Network-initiated location requests through a C2K network.
 5. VoWiFi location registration requests.
 6. Modem/AP location requests for EM debugging.
 7. Improved telecom network camp time.
 8. Other miscellaneous functions.
To allow this service to access your device location, please set the location permission to Allow.
